AI, Chatbots -- ways to keep up on the conversation

Generative AI is getting a lot of attention in the media (social, print, TV, etc.)

How can you learn more about generative text, artificial intelligence and chatbots?  -- how can you move beyond the hype to assess and evaluate the good, bad and the ugly about this emerging game-changing technology? 

How can you learn more than a Google search or a ChatGPT answer will give you?

Discover more about AI and all the ways it influences different aspects of society by exploring this Research Guide. 

Explore the frontiers of Gen AI from these sources:

Artificial Intelligence from the United Nations gives perspectivas on AI for social good and the social impact of AI.

Explore the website for Stanford's Center for Artificial Intelligence and Medicine.

Look through NIST's Artificial Intelligence pages. 

Explore IEEE Spectrum's page on Generative AI.

Search arxiv.org, a preprint server, for the latest technical papers on GenAI
